Articles.Content:
I'm stuck on something, so I Wonder if someone can help : I need to detect and do something just before a part is docked.

Unfortunatly for me, it seem that there is no "onPartDock" event in KSP 0.21 (however "onPartUndock" exist, that weird)

I thought using "onPartCouple", however it's not good for me because it happen too late and both vessels are already moved at this point.

So, I'm not aware of all the C# possibilities, but does anyone know if there is an other way to detect the use of the docking Method from the "ModuleDockingNode" class partmodule ?

If not, I think the only way will be to ask to squad ?

Edited September 12, 2013 by KospY

Nope, I'm pretty sure it is not possible. Also i do can not really imagine what you tare trying to accomplish. At that point, "magnetism" has kicked in anyway, so all you can measure is how effective those attraction was.
